Data visualization design principles provide guidances for how to make informative plots. We can implement these design principles with ggplot2 themes.

## Learning objectives

* Learn design principles of graphical excellence and graphical integrity
* Maximize data-ink ratio and minimize chartjunk
* Use themes to customize plot area, grid lines, legends, and fonts
